message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I understand you have a budget in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $17,000, so I'm offering $13,500.
